setting: The sun was already setting that evening. Kaleb was going to meet Tom to collect the mysterious gem he told about. Kaleb sees Tom resting in the shade under a large oak in the park. Tom is nervously kicking a rock.

dialogue.name: Tom
text: I have been waiting for you for hours!
We've got to leave here immediately.
I am afraid an old friend of mine will spot me here.

dialogue.name: Kaleb
text: Where do you want to go?
Because I don't know anywhere safe and quiet in this town.
And going to your apartment on the first day of meeting you is too fishy...

dialogue.name: Tom
text: Okay then, let's stop wasting time.

dialogue.name: Tom
text: Oh, stop with that bullshit. Let's just go to my place then.
